entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • AppHost.Bundle.Tests Test host process crashed on Linux x64 Release CoreCLR Installer Build and Test #82202
  • Mono AOT Compiler packs are missing `data/UnixFilePermissions.xml`? #82201
    8.0.0
  • [SuperFileCheck] Consider regex helpers #82199
    Future
  • Support DivRem intrinsincs in mono #82195
  • Consume DivRem intrinsics from Math.DivRem #82194
  • Newly added intellisense msbuild conditions cause overbuild #82191
  • Regression: ObjectDisposedException in overridden FileStream.Dispose(bool disposing) #82186
  • Blazor WASM Using the Wrong Currency Negative Pattern (1 vs 0) for en-US #82178
    Future
  • Regression: Derived FileStream no longer calls Close in DisposeAsync #82176
  • LoggerMessageAttribute doesn't support parameters with dots #82172
    Future
  • HttpProtocolException is not reported properly on initial HTTP/2 settings handshake failure #82168
  • JIT: Stop representing local addresses as TYP_BYREF #82166
    8.0.0
  • SPMI: Spurious diffs when stressing profiler ELT callbacks #82164
  • runtime-community pipeline fails to build #82161
  • Crash on startup on Android in Release when referencing a class with non ascii characters from a class library #82187
  • [NativeAOT] Update documentation when building native libraries with a custom native host #82156
    8.0.0
  • [QUIC] Failing Arm 32 platforms #82154
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: File.ReadLines增加支持读写的打开方式，很多时候在打开的同时还有应用在写入，避免占用报错 #82152
  • XUnitLogChecker causes GCStress test failures #82143
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: Microsoft.DotNet.XUnitExtensions.SkipTestException : Precision on float numbers #82141

Closed

  • Add DivMod instrinct for intel x86/x64 #27292
    Future
  • Runtime assemblies contain invalid type forwarders #82169
  • NamedMutex outerloop test failures #82052
  • Intrinsify RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan on Mono #80762
    8.0.0
  • Customize SNI separately in HttpClient #82165
  • build v7.0.3 tags hit error #82151
  • Breaking change with timeout reading serial port in .NET 7 (Possible Overlapped I/O change) #80079
    8.0.0
  • Workaround for providing support for types JObject with System.Text.Json #82167
  • Test failure baseservices/multidimmarray/rank1array/rank1array.sh #82144
  • "The server is not operational" error when using System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement to get user groups #42914
    Future
  • Support P/Invokes not going through a pre-stub in Tier 1 #82133
    8.0.0
  • release/6.0 does not build cleanly with LLVM 13 / Xcode 13.3 #80208
    6.0.x
  • Test failure System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.CancellationTokenTests.CancellationTokenSource_CancelAsync_AllCallbacksInvoked #82140
  • HttpClient creates Quic threads even if HTTP/3 is not in use #74629
    6.0.x
  • Add handling for SIMD constants in Mono #81482
    Future
  • Linux runtime only uses 1 core of those available when running with forced scheduler affinity #81289
    8.0.0
  • Expose managed Main with NativeAOT when compiling the application as a static library #81097
    8.0.0
  • SupportedLinuxPlatforms_IsSupportedIsTrue fails on distros without quic #82077
    8.0.0
  • Error while building linux clr on windows #82119

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid a RIP relative addressing pessimization #82213
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Prevent XUnitLogChecker from failing if no logs are found #82212
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Workloads: Fix a regression in file permissions for workload packs #82211
    area-Workloads
  • [release/6.0] Add a RID for Fedora 39 #82210
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • JIT: don't optimize calls to CORINFO_HELP_VIRTUAL_FUNC_PTR #82209
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Add a RID for Fedora 39 #82208
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Hold temporary keychain refs for certificates imported with X509Certificate2Collection.Import #82205
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Microsoft.NETCore.Platforms: fix graph not being updated on pack. #82204
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Fix tests to use ConditionalFact that need it #82203
    area-System.Drawing
  • Add EventPipe library support to CrossGen2 #82200
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Use optimistic concurrency when configuring JsonTypeInfo metadata. #82198
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Mark .overrides from marked methods in a copy assembly #82197
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: fix some asserts in profile incorporation and reconstruction #82196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding more SIMD constant folding support #82190
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for dumping native stacks with cdb #82189
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure
  • Update Microsoft.DiaSymReader.Native from 16.9.0-beta1.21055.5 to 16.11.23-beta1.23063.1 #82188
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add RID for Fedora 39 #82185
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Disable additional sourcegenerator tests #82184
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix clr build on illumos-x64 #82183
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Use more idiomatic cmake style #82182
    area-Build-mono
  • Combine ExecutionContext/CapturedContext fields in ManualResetValueTaskSourceCore #82181
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Create source generator for ConfigurationBinder #82179
    NO-REVIEW, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Add cmake check for ioclt prototype #82173
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • JIT: Expand loop detection in if-conversion #82170
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • corehost: derive fallback rid from output rid. #82163
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Build test tree with partial trimming #82157
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add jiterpreter trace transfer and other optimizations #82149
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Append leftovers of FromBase64Transform's input buffer to the transform buffer #82148
    area-System.Security
  • Use shared IValueTaskSource implementation in AwaitableSocketAsyncEventArgs #82147
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Add CollectionsMarshal.SetCount(list, count) #82146
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Separate the generation of PerfMap and JitDump files #82142
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • [tests][iOSSim] Disable StartupHook #82175
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix emitting `DehydratedDataCommand.ZeroFill` when alignment is high #82155
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Create skeleton for the ComInterfaceGenerator #80887
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Add new Xml Type parser #82145
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Stop compiling jiterpreter traces when we reach another trace #82130
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Fix NamedMutex PAL test #82122
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Intrinsify CreateSpan #82093
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • CI: don't trigger *all* library tests on wasm-only changes #81906
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • eng/SourceBuild.props: remove dangling SourceBuildNonPortable. #82160
    community-contribution
  • Fix reporting of an async IO timeout error on Windows (`SerialPort`) #81744
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • SPMI: Ensure we disable loop alignment consistently #82100
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update CEEInfo::getAddressOfPInvokeTarget to handle already resolved P/Invokes #82150
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Parametrized macros for emitting arm64/neon opcodes #81887
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix CancellationTokenSource_CancelAsync_AllCallbacksInvoked test #82153
    area-System.Threading
  • [Android] Disable another failing System.Net.Sockets test #82162
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-android
  • [mono] Implement synch block fast paths in managed #81380
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Adding support to mono for v128 constants #81902
  • [QUIC] Disable libmsquic presence test on failing platforms #82159
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Baseline another JIT test #82158
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] do not throw if culture data does not exist in icu #82094
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • [QUIC] Do not run unconditional Quic test outside our CI #82108
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Simplify an error condition in tryrun.cmake #82070
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Baseline some failing JIT tests #82075
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Bump generic cycle detection cutoff for the test tree #82074
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #82115
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] add missing RIDs #82120
    area-Infrastructure
  • [NativeAOT] Add ability to generate library and exe entry points #81873
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove reference to Cecil submodule in illink #82124
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #82117
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] add RID for Ubuntu 23.04 #82123
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x

Updated

  • Add new proposed API to Ancillary.Interop #81063
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Implementation of Lemire's nearly divisionless method #79790
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Issue correct Enable/Disable commands for EventSources with EventPipe #81867
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove ConfigurationBinder usage from Console Logging #82098
    area-Extensions-Logging, size-reduction
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2115250 #81871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [MONO] Implement GC.AddMemoryPressure in Mono #82121
    area-GC-mono
  • Add reflection introspection support for function pointers #81006
    area-System.Reflection, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • [wasi] Add `WasiAppBuilder` task #82126
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Enable building NativeAOT for Apple mobile platforms #81780
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [JIT] LclMorph `GT_IND(GT_LCL_VAR_ADDR)` => `GT_CAST(GT_LCL_VAR)` narrow-cast only #81454
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update ILLink wording #82050
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [SuperFileCheck] Added verification when using 'FULL-LINE-NEXT'. Fixing ARM64 comparison tests. #82135
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Make `WasmMainJSPath` optional #81484
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Include more details in exception from wrong async callback #82104
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • Implement native container types used by shared EventPipe code. #78852
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Refactor common variables used for the "send runtime tests to helix" steps into a shared template that all of our pipelines that run runtime tests can use. #81926
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono][aot] Enable dedup by default for iOS #81319
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Update NativeAOT build integration targets to include ioslike platforms #82086
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Add instrinsics for common Vector128 operations #81782
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Skip wasm frames if just my code is enabled #81732
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Consider numeric string json for EnumConverter. #79432
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Unify type instantiations in reflection emit #81518
    area-System.Reflection
  • [wasm][debugger] Test new chrome version. #82109
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Use cinc instead of csel when possible #82031
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Slightly refactor handling of conditions/conditional branches in the backend #82020
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Considerably speed up building the test tree on Windows #82080
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Vectorize Enumerable.Range(...).ToArray() #80633
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Proposed host runtime delegate for loading an assembly #82138
    area-Host
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup intrinsinsics + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix disposing root X.509 certificate prematurely for OCSP stapling #82116
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [JIT] X64 - Extend emitter peephole optimization of eliminating unnecessary `mov` instructions #79381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement Test Process Watcher #78742
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Qualys scan showing vulnerabilities in SDK #30659
  • "dotnet test" using the glob pattern #30655
  • [GenAPI] Add unsafe keyword if the calls of the base constructor is unsafe  #30640
    8.0.1xx
  • [GenAPI] Do not synthesized dummy generic field of filtered type #30627
  • Build fails when using sdk version 7.0.200 #30625
  • Breaking change inside v7.0.200 - MSBuild Preview version used !? #30624

Closed

  • ClickOnce EV code sign with USB HSM - This certificate does not contain a private key #30534
  • [Pack] NU1102 errors occur when running command “dotnet pack --runtime win10-x64” #30654
  • Broken build in version 7.0.200 #30623
  • DOTNET CLI - dotnet test --Filter throws unknown switch error, filter options currently appears to be case sensitive #30629
  • Code analysis reporting bogus warning messages without a issue number #30592
  • Warn on publishing solutions / path forward for publishing solutions #3650
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Downgrade errors for specifying `--output` for solutions to warnings #30660
    Servicing-consider
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #30657
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #30653
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #30646
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30645
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #30644
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #30635
    Area-Infrastructure
  • 24004: Add --configfile switch to dotnet list package #30615
    Area-Infrastructure
  • #28518: Stop generating NETSDK1138 warning when OutputType is Library. #30612
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Refactor allowEmptyTelemetry to use Items and support hashing #30269
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Port 30573 to 6.0.3xx #30643
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Try not building the test assets and see what happens #29376
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #30604
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30595
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.2xx #30601
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Bump FluentAssertions from 6.9.0 to 6.10.0 #30616
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Bump FluentAssertions from 6.9.0 to 6.10.0 #30617
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update to the .net runtime that released today. #30611
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Introduce `Workload Clean`: Garbage Collection Component #30266
    Area-Infrastructure
  • GenAPI: add workaround for IFieldSymbol.Name that has angle brackets #30572
    Area-GenAPI
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2115230 #30412
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-15
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal] Required Properties #3630
    11.0

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add roles spec covering static extensions #6880

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Rename not working in VS2022 community #66910
    17.6
  • Editorconfig UTF-8 BOM setting is ignored when creating a new file #66907
    17.6
  • Code Cleanup applying wrong "this." preferences #66906
    17.6
  • Code cleanup rules are way too aggressive #66905
    17.6
  • Completions are missing at the end of a range operator #66903
  • CS8078 when compiling a test that uses a 1000 parameter constructor #66900
  • Remove unused automatically-added using directives on save #66898
  • High CPU usage in VBCSCompiler after update .NET 6 to .NET 7 #66895
  • Add doc explaining the analyzer execution logic in CompilationWithAnalyzers/AnalyzerDriver #66894
    17.6

Closed

  • Add support for capture of implicit `this` parameter in MakeLocalFunctionStatic #38734
    Backlog
  • IncrementalValuesProvider returns wrong cached objects #66840
    17.6
  • Pressing F1 on VB.NET keyword DirectCast goes to the wrong page #66736
    17.6
  • PublicAPI fixer not working in compiler project #66740
  • Allow a ref field to refer to a ref struct type #62243
    Compiler.Next
  • Incorrect IL for optimized struct assignment #48688
    Compiler.Next
  • Test plan for static local functions #32069
    Compiler.Next
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33414.364 #66891
  • Completion inside a switch expression on an enum should preselect the enum #39240
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve 'introduce variable for expression' when using tuples #66909
    Area-IDE
  • Bugs/1436225 thread block #66904
    Area-IDE
  • EnC: Avoid loading DiaSymReader unless Windows PDB is actually read #66901
    Area-IDE
  • Rename options to editorconfig like name #66899
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Update 'make local function static' to support capturing 'this' as a parameter to that local funtion. #66875
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move the 'make method synchronous' fixer down to shared layer #66862
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Make F1 work for DirectCast and TryCast #66882
    Area-IDE, Next
  • VisualBasicPackage must be constructed on the main thread #66797
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66902
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add some EnC tests for primary constructors #66897
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Fix IDE behavior and tests for some Primary Constructors scenarios #66896
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Move 'doc comment' related code fixers down to shared layer #66860
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix the span of 'introduce parameter' #66887
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move 'convert to record' fixer down to shared layer #66859
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move the 'remove new modifier' fixer down to shared layer #66857
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into PrimaryConstructors #66866
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66892
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66890
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix enum preselection in switch expressions #66883
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Ensure that files added are immediately hooked up to open buffers #66550
    Area-IDE
  • Use next sibling in SyntaxNode.GetChildPosition() if available #66876
    Area-Compilers
  • Move the 'make method async' fixer down to shared layer #66863
    Area-IDE
  • Fix parsing of 'file[]' and 'required[]' in old language versions #66769
    Area-Compilers
  • Include nullability informtion in QuickInfo when invoked on 'var' #66877
    Area-IDE
  • Clean and rename FeatureOnOffOptions #66881
    Area-IDE
  • Fix SymbolDisplay to use 'Operator' kind when producing the display for an operator symbol #66880
    Area-Compilers
  • Add more using-alias-to-type tests #66889
    Area-Compilers
  • Address PROTOTYPE comments for "Primary Constructors" #66865
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • [PERF] Remove all partial analysis state tracking in CompilationWithAnalyzers #66750
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Tenet-Performance
  • Provide unique suggestions when generating member names #66824
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Track state table removal due to input separately from removal due to selection #66643
    Area-Compilers
  • Do not suggest to remove discard, if it can lead to a compiler error #66879
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Make scripting work in single-file deployments #57910
    Area-Interactive, Community
  • Hook up DidChangeConfiguration from client #66861
    Area-IDE
  • WIP - fix workspace pull diagnostics #66886
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [SignalR] Stateful reconnect #46691
  • Why `Result.ValidationProblem` requires `IDictionary<string, string[]>` instead of `IReadOnlyDictionary<string, string[]>`? #46689
  • [Blazor] We can handle forms for server rendered razor component applications #46688
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct #46686
  • Perf regression: fortunes #46685
  • Perf improvement: json #46684
  • Adding health checks with AddHealthChecks().AddCheck() prevents calls to IHeathCheckPublisher.PublishChecks #46683
  • [Blazor] Provide a primitive inside Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web for rendering output to HTML #46682
  • Reduce the size cost of unused protocol support #46681
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Make generic `EndpointFilterInvocationContext` overloads public #46676
  • .NET 7 Blazor WASM breaks when using UsePathBase #46674
  • Harmonize the Blazor WebAssembly SDK + the .NET WASM SDK #46673
    8.0-preview2
  • OutputCacheMiddleware argument null exception if policy sets AllowCacheLookup to false and AllowCacheStorage to true #46671
  • Mismatch in request field names between swagger and gRPC to JSON transcoding #46670
  • Can't retrieve MemoryCache statistics using dotnet-counters #46669
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-preview.1.23107.4]SmartStore app some javascript function don't work after building and publishing with .net8 SDK #46692
  • Scaffolding uses Id for Foreign Key dropdown instead of Name. #46664
  • Blazor component events not trigger in MVC partial view when calling via javascript #46663
  • SignalR disconnect doesn't fire immediately #46661

Closed

  • DateOnly custom TypeConverter is ignored when using FromQuery #46384
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Remove (Http)(Validation)ProblemDetails converters #44132
    8.0-preview2
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #46649
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-preview.1.23107.4] Build with Error ASP0019,ASP0023 after retargeting to .NET 8.0 for OrchardCMS app #46642
  • Allow QuickGrid columns to be put in user-defined razor components. #45088
    Backlog
  • VSCode Blazor Wasm Extension - "DEBUGGING IS NOT ENABLED" #46445
    8.0-preview2
  • Perf regression: fortunes #46650

PullRequests

Created

  • Sync shared code from runtime #46690
    area-runtime
  • [release/7.0] Prefer TypeConverter over TryParse #46687
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0.x
  • Introducing `IProblemDetailsService.TryWriteAsync` #46680
  • Fix nullability on DefaultEndpointFilterInvocationContext constructor #46679
    area-runtime
  • Update servicing milestones for April servicing #46675
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Transport.Quic.Tests: don't fail on distros that don't have quic. #46662
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix runtime sync script #46672
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview2
  • Removing custom ProblemDetails Converters #46492
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview2
  • Prefer TypeConverter over TryParse #46577
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview2
  • Add support for binding parameter with [FromBody] #46641
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview2
  • Streaming SSR partial doc updates #46667
  • Preserve DOM elements when inserting passive content #46666
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #46646
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.4

Updated

  • SDK Bump to `8.0.100-preview.2.23113.1` #46328
    area-infrastructure
  • Add support for parameter binding with [FromService] #46653
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
  • Changing reflection-based json configuration #46303
    area-web-frameworks
  • Update CreateSlimBuilder to use Host.CreateEmptyApplicationBuilder. #46579
    area-web-frameworks
  • WIP: Add WebViewManager.Dispatch() method #46644
    area-blazor, * NO MERGE *
  • Tweak exception message for `TryParse` method not found #46574
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
  • Defer search for dev cert until build bind time #46296
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Added operation cancel operation #46330
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Greater than 1 FromBody analyzer. #46494

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add XAML analyzers to avoid common pitfalls #13368
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI `StackLayout` complicates migration from Xamarin.Forms #13366
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Write device test to validate CharacterSpacing changes #13361
    Backlog
  • Java.Lang.IllegalArgumentException: The style on this component requires your app theme to be Theme.MaterialComponent. #13356
    Backlog
  • Make IBorderElement properties settable #13349
    Backlog
  • Maui Shell Title View Disappearing after navigating through tabs (ios & Android) #13347
    Backlog
  • Add PointerPressed and PointerReleased events and commands to PointerGestureRecognizer #13346
    Backlog
  • Indicator view does not update using Visual states #13343
    Backlog
  • Content not rendered when setting FlowDirection as RightToLeft for ContentView in iOS and MacCatalyst #13342
    Backlog
  • Debugging/Deployment in iOS with net7.0 is broken #13340

Closed

  • .NET MAUI RC1 - CollectionView extremely slow #6317
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Label TextType="Html" Crash in Windows if html is "Broken" #11311
    Backlog
  • BoxView is rendered always with a black background #10850
    Backlog
  • BoxView BackgroundColor always gray #8972
    Backlog
  • Flyout on Windows doesn't display programmatically created entries. #12149
    Backlog
  • Button does not resize to fit text with CharacterSpacing #10293
    Backlog
  • [Scenario Days 02 Dec] Crash trying to use SearchHandler #11823
    Backlog
  • Shell Tabbar doesn't behave correctly when changing tab icon image (through binding or style triggers) #12105
    .NET 8 Planning
  • SetPadding for Entry does not work in .NET 7/MAUI 7 in Android #12224
    .NET 8 Planning
  • On Windows, ImageButton is set to isEnable=false. When isEnable=true is set, the button status is gray #13157
  • (Even empty app, not with other regular desktop browsers) MAUI.Blazor, with rapid (keyboard + mouse) input between multiple div element with contenteditable set to true, becomes unresponsive to mouse / touch #13314
  • Build `Android` fail #12990
  • [Bug] Shell.ForegroundColor in WINUI different from other platforms #3078
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Httpclient can't use header Host SNI #8673
  • FlyoutHeader does not render properly on ios #8769
  • Google Analytics implementation #13330
  • Google Ads implementation #13329
  • Long running GeoLocation #13335
  • App crash on iOS when using SQLite-net-pcl #13334

PullRequests

Created

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-15
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Performance of `GetMigrations()` extension method over `DatabaseFacade` #30192
  • IEnumerable Contains(...) generates non parameterized sql #30201
  • EFCore 7 - Aggregate types - Update JSON column without using any JSON function #30283
  • EFCore 7 - Aggregate types- Inserting custom value for boolean key in JSON column #30276
  • ExecuteUpdateAsync don't work when using "modelBuilder.Entity<Country>().Navigation(e => e.MyFile).AutoInclude();" in Context #30250
  • EnitytFrameworkCore.InMemory v6.0.13: FromSqlRaw throws InvalidCastException: Unable to cast object of type 'System.Linq.Expressions.ConstantExpression' to type 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.QueryRootExpression. #30267
  • Apply Migrations Bundles:error #30259
  • Missing word in sentence #30260
  • Prevent changing value of columns by attribute #30238
  • Auto insert for a related entity may insert duplicated rows with a `one-to-one` relationship #30236
  • Translate TimeOnly.AddHours, AddMinutes on SQLite #30223
  • Wrong EF migration script generated from same entity #30209
  • SqlException: "No column name was specified for column 1 of 't'" on IQueryable.Count() with Skip and Take #30239
  • MySQL EnityFramework Errors in MAUI #30189
  • Problem with optional foreign keys #30184
  • EFCore migration for encrypted sqlite throws exception #30179
  • asp.net core entity framework core issues #30292

Updated

  • JOIN instead of CROSS APPLY in generated query in SQL Server #17936
    Backlog
  • Query: missing parens for complex query with Not and Negate #30277
    8.0.0
  • Query/NullSemantics: full expansion not necessary for bool results in projection on sql server because we convert to CASE block anyway (search condition) #30264
    Backlog
  • Query: convert `NOT(match LIKE pattern)` to `match NOT LIKE pattern` #30263
    Backlog
  • Query: potential bug in null semantics VisitSqlBinary #30247
    Backlog
  • Sum throwing exception when property has a ValueConverter with ConvertsNulls set to true #30233
    Backlog
  • Consider cancelling the command in SaveChanges when an error occurs #30182
    Backlog
  • Support of unnamed parameters in Microsoft.Data.Sqlite #24480
    Backlog
  • Tools: Honor launchSettings.json #8695
    Backlog
  • Scaffold-DbContext generates DateTime instead of DateTimeOffset for PostgreSQL database #30274
  • Issues with get only collections in EF7 #30286
  • "You need to call SQLitePCL.raw.SetProvider()" error when using Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite 5.0.4 via C++\CLI wrapper #24493
    Backlog
  • Generate the compiled model during build #24894
    Backlog
  • Migrations script not using IDesignTimeDbContextFactory #25053
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #30289
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #30288
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.4

Updated

  • SqlServer: Support hierarchyid #30291
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.31.2 to 3.32.0 #30272
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
